item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Privacy Policy

We do not collect, store, sell, or share personal data from users of our app or website.

  • All app data is stored locally on your device.
  • We do not transmit, process, or retain user data on any server.
  • We do not resell or otherwise monetize user data.

If you want to remove any local data created by the app, uninstalling or deleting the app from your device will remove that data.

item.title: Thank You
item.description: Thank you for contact us, will be in touch soon
